Package com.auction_system.entities.clients

Class Client

java.lang.Object
com.auction_system.entities.clients.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Individual, LegalEntity
public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntity
This class models a client for the application.

    • login

      public static Client login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hash) throws MyException, java.sql.SQLException
      Logs in the client to the auction house
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the client
      hash - the password hash
      Returns:
      a Client object
      Throws:
      MyException - if there are any errors
      java.sql.SQLException - if there are any SQL errors

    • register

      public static void register​(Client client, java.lang.String hash) throws MyException, java.sql.SQLException
      Registers a client to the auction house
      Parameters:
      client - the client object used by the registration
      hash - the password hash
      Throws:
      MyException - if there are any errors
      java.sql.SQLException - if there are any SQL errors

    • addBid

      public void addBid​(int productId, double maxPrice, int rate)
      Adds a new bid to an auction
      Parameters:
      productId - the id of the product
      maxPrice - the maximum price that the client can bid
      rate - the bidding growth rate

    • getOffer

      public double getOffer​(int productId, double maxBid)
      Gets a new bid for the product
      Parameters:
      productId - the id of the product
      maxBid - the maximum bid so far
      Returns:
      the new offer
